backstories.clan_founder: This wolf is one of the founding members of the Pack.
backstories.clanborn: This wolf was born into the Pack where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} currently {VERB/m_c/reside/resides}.
backstories.halfclan1: This wolf was born into the Pack, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents resides in another Pack.
backstories.halfclan2: This wolf was born in another Pack, but chose to come to this Pack to be with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} other parent.
backstories.outsider_roots1: This wolf was born into the Pack, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents is an outsider that belongs to no Pack.
backstories.outsider_roots2: This wolf was born outside the Pack, but came to live in the Pack with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent at a young age.
backstories.loner1: This wolf joined the Pack by choice after living life as a loner.
backstories.loner2: This wolf used to live in a barn, but mostly stayed away from Twolegs. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} decided Pack life might be an interesting change of pace.
backstories.kittypet1: This wolf joined the Pack by choice after living life with Twolegs as a pet.
backstories.kittypet2: This wolf used to live on something called a 'boat' with Twolegs, but decided to join the Pack.
backstories.kittypet3: This wolf used to be a pet. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} got lost after wandering away, and when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} returned home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs were gone. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Pack.
backstories.kittypet4: This wolf used to be a pet. One day, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} got sick, and {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs brought {PRONOUN/m_c/object} into the belly of a monster. The Twolegs then left {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to fend for {PRONOUN/m_c/self}.
backstories.rogue1: This wolf joined the Pack by choice after living life as a rogue.
backstories.rogue2: This wolf used to live in a Twolegplace, scrounging for what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could find. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} thought the Pack might offer {PRONOUN/m_c/object} more security.
backstories.rogue3: This wolf used to live alone in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own territory, but was chased out by something and eventually found the Pack.
backstories.abandoned1: This wolf was found by the Pack as a pup and has been living with them ever since.
backstories.abandoned2: This wolf was born outside of the Pack, but was brought to the Pack as a pup and has lived here ever since.
backstories.abandoned3: This wolf was born into another Pack, but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} left here as a pup for the Pack to raise.
backstories.abandoned4: This wolf was found and taken in after being abandoned by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs as a pup.
backstories.otherclan1: This wolf was born into another Pack, but came to this Pack by choice.
backstories.otherclan2: This wolf was unhappy in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Pack and decided to come here instead.
backstories.otherclan3: This wolf's Pack stayed with the Pack after a disaster struck {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old one, and decided to stay after the rest of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Pack returned home.
backstories.otherclan4: This wolf grew up in another Pack, but chose to leave that life and join the Pack {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} now {VERB/m_c/live/lives} in.
backstories.disgraced1: This wolf was cast out of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Pack for some transgression that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} not keen on talking about.
backstories.disgraced2: This wolf was exiled from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Pack for something {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} didn't do and came here to seek safety.
backstories.disgraced3: This wolf once held a high rank in another Pack but was exiled for reasons {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/refuse/refuses} to share.
backstories.retired_leader: This wolf used to be the leader of another Pack before deciding {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} needed a change of scenery after leadership became too much. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} returned {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nine lives and let {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} deputy take over before coming here.
backstories.medicine_cat: This wolf was once a medicine wolf in another Pack.
backstories.ostracized_warrior: This wolf was ostracized from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Pack, but no one really knows why.
backstories.refugee1: This wolf came to this Pack after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former Pack and the tyrannical leader that had taken over.
backstories.refugee2: This wolf used to live as a loner, but after another wolf chased {PRONOUN/m_c/object} from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} took refuge in the Pack.
backstories.refugee3: This wolf used to be a pet, but joined the Pack after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cruel Twoleg.
backstories.refugee4: This wolf used to be in a rogue group, but joined the Pack after fleeing from the group's tyrannical leader.
backstories.refugee5: This wolf got washed away from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former territory in a flood that destroyed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home but was glad to find a new home in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new Pack here.
backstories.tragedy_survivor1: Something horrible happened to this wolf's previous Pack. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} refuse to speak about it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor2: This wolf used to be part of a rogue group, but joined the Pack after something terrible happened to it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor3: This wolf used to be a pet, but joined the Pack after something terrible happened to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs.
backstories.tragedy_survivor4: This wolf used to be a loner, but joined the Pack after something terrible made {PRONOUN/m_c/object} leave {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old home behind.
backstories.wandering_healer1: This wolf used to wander, helping those where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could, and eventually found the Pack.
backstories.wandering_healer2: This wolf used to live in a specific spot, offering help to all who wandered by, but eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Pack.
backstories.guided1: This wolf used to be a pet, but after dreaming of starry-furred wolves, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} followed their whispers to the Pack.
backstories.guided2: This wolf used to live a rough life as a rogue. While wandering, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found a set of starry pawprints, and followed them to the Pack.
backstories.guided3: This wolf used to live as a loner. A starry-furred wolf appeared to {PRONOUN/m_c/object} one day, and then led {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to the Pack.
backstories.guided4: This wolf used to live in a different Pack, until a sign from StarPack told {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to leave.
backstories.orphaned1: This wolf was found with a deceased parent. The Pack took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't hide where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} came from.
backstories.orphaned2: This wolf was found with a deceased parent. The Pack took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't tell {PRONOUN/m_c/object} where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} really came from.
backstories.orphaned3: This wolf was found as a pup among the wreckage of a Monster with no parents in sight and got brought to live in the Pack.
backstories.orphaned4: This wolf was found as a pup hiding near a place of battle where there were no survivors and got brought to live in the Pack.
backstories.orphaned5: This wolf was found as a pup hiding near {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent's bodies and got brought to live in the Pack.
backstories.orphaned6: This wolf was found flailing in the ocean as a teeny puppy, no parent in sight.
backstories.outsider1: This wolf was born outside of a Pack.
backstories.outsider2: This wolf was born outside of a Pack, but at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} birth one parent was a member of a Pack.
backstories.outsider3: This wolf was born outside of a Pack, while {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent was lost.
